description: Set up Temporal infrastructure for local development and production deployment. Configure docker-compose.yml with Temporal server, UI, and PostgreSQL dependencies. Create temporal-config.yml for workflow and activity registration. Implement Temporal client factory in NestJS backend for workflow execution. Set up development vs production Temporal server connection via environment variables (TEMPORAL_CLUSTER_URL, TEMPORAL_NAMESPACE). Configure worker pools for each workflow type. Add health check for Temporal connection.
title: Temporal Infrastructure Setup for Development and Production
